name: Ice Wings Plus
description:
THE GREAT ENDLESS RUNNER OF COMBAT JETS IS BACK !!

*** SILVER AWARD in Pocket Gamer - REVIEW SCORE 8/10 ***

With more than 680.000 downloads in the App Store, Ice Wings: Skies of Steel has been converted in reference for the lovers of speed and fighter jets.

ICE WINGS PLUS ELEVATES THE ICE WINGS SAGA TO A UPPER LEVEL
With a lot of new improvements and features added, Ice Wings Plus is a next step forward in the Ice Wings Saga, giving to the player an amazing game experience.

HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS IN A iOS DEVICE
Real-time shadows, camera filters, normal mapping, FX, definitively, unique graphics that will make you enjoy like in a console.

FRENETIC ACTION
Fly at maximum speed avoiding obstacles and destroying enemies, ACTION is the best word that define Ice Wings Plus.

LOTS OF COMPATIBLE DEVICES
From iPad2 and above, iPhone 4S and above, iPod Touch 5th Gen and above, you can enjoy with Ice Wings Plus.

FIGHTER JETS WITH UNIQUE FEATURES
Each aircraft has unique properties, weight, damage, acceleration, try to unlock them and decide which one is your favourite.

ARMORED ROBOT ?
For first time in Ice Wings, we introduced I.W.A.R-01 (Ice Wings Armored Robot), a robot designed for the air combat.

BOOSTER FOR HELP YOU
Use the booster that appears for going faster, increase your damage or protect you against enemies.

EACH GAME IS DIFFERENT
The level is generated randomly, each game will be different from the previous one, you will enjoy for hours and hours.

SHARE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
Show your friends your skills like pilot, share and post your score on Facebook or invite them to try to beat your score.

CHALLENGE WORLDWIDE
Submit your score to the worldwide Game Center ranking to show that you are the best Ice Wings pilot.

MORE AND MORE
Follow Ice Wings Plus in Twitter (@IceWingsPlus) and become fan on Facebook for receive exclusive information about the game, future updates and more.

UNIVERSAL APP
Play Ice Wings Plus in all your devices, and pay only once.

NO IN-APP PURCHASES
Forget about In-App purchases, Ice Wings Plus is a complete game itself that you can enjoy all the times that you want. Buy it once and have it forever.

Support the game and developer following them on Twitter: @IceWingsPlus and @MassiveFun3D
